code: import React from"react";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import"../styles/main.css";import"../styles/responsive.css";import"../styles/home.css";import profileImage from"../images/raghav.png";import backgroundImage from"../images/RWOVDDW.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero-background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:backgroundImage,alt:"Cinematic Background",className:"desaturated-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-image-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profileImage,alt:"Raghav Raj Sobti",className:"profile-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h1,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.8},children:"RAGHAV RAJ SOBTI"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h2,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.8,delay:0.2},children:"PHOTOGRAPHER & VIDEOGRAPHER"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.p,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.8,delay:0.4},children:"Bringing stories to life through compelling visuals and cinematic storytelling"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"cta-buttons",initial:{opacity:0},animate:{opacity:1},transition:{duration:0.8,delay:0.6},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/projects",className:"animated-button",children:"VIEW MY WORK"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/contact",className:"animated-button",children:"CONTACT ME"})]})]})]})]})});};export default Home;
